hairstyles.name: Classic Long Layers
hairstyles.description: Soft, flowing layers that frame the face beautifully. Perfect for oval faces as it maintains the natural balance.
tips: Ask your stylist for face-framing layers
Use a round brush for volume at the ends

hairstyles.name: Blunt Bob
hairstyles.description: A sharp, chin-length bob that creates a sleek and modern look. Oval faces can pull off this bold style effortlessly.
tips: Keep ends blunt for maximum impact
Use a flat iron for that sleek finish

hairstyles.name: Beachy Waves
hairstyles.description: Effortless, tousled waves that give a relaxed, summery vibe. Perfect for oval faces looking for low-maintenance glamour.
tips: Use sea salt spray for texture
Air dry or use a diffuser
Scrunch while drying for more wave

hairstyles.name: Sleek Ponytail
hairstyles.description: A polished, high ponytail that showcases your balanced features. Ideal for formal events or a chic everyday look.
tips: Wrap hair around elastic for elegance

hairstyles.name: Curtain Bangs
hairstyles.description: Soft, face-framing bangs that part in the middle and sweep to the sides. Adds a retro-modern touch to any length.
tips: Blow dry with a round brush
Start longer - you can always cut shorter

hairstyles.name: Pixie Cut
hairstyles.description: A bold, short cut that highlights your facial features. Oval faces are ideal for this daring style.

hairstyles.name: Voluminous Curls
hairstyles.description: Big, bouncy curls that add drama and glamour. Perfect for special occasions or making a statement.
tips: Use hot rollers or curling iron

hairstyles.name: Messy Bun
hairstyles.description: An effortlessly chic updo that looks polished yet relaxed. Great for both casual and dressed-up occasions.
tips: Don't overthink it - messy is the goal

hairstyles.name: Shoulder Length Lob
hairstyles.description: A timeless, versatile cut that sits at the shoulders. Easy to style and flatters oval faces beautifully.

hairstyles.name: Side Part Glamour
hairstyles.description: A deep side part with cascading waves for Old Hollywood glamour. Elegant and sophisticated.
tips: Use shine serum for glossy finish
Create with large barrel curling iron
Pin one side behind ear for drama

hairstyles.name: Natural Texture
hairstyles.description: Embrace your natural hair texture with this low-maintenance style. Let your curls or waves shine.

hairstyles.name: Straight and Sleek
hairstyles.description: Super straight, glossy hair that looks polished and professional. A timeless choice for oval faces.

hairstyles.name: Textured Shag
hairstyles.description: A modern take on the classic shag with lots of layers and movement. Edgy yet feminine.

hairstyles.name: Half Up Half Down
hairstyles.description: The best of both worlds - hair pulled back from the face while still showing off length.
tips: Secure with cute clips or scrunchie
Add waves to the down portion

hairstyles.name: French Twist
hairstyles.description: An elegant updo that's perfect for formal occasions. Classic and sophisticated.
